summary: Project to implement a minimal backend admin system with an admin list, including adding a specified principal ID as an admin.
architectural_notes: Backend maintains an admin allowlist (principal IDs) used for admin authorization checks.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a minimal backend admin system and add principal ID fxms2-qslpu-4ybaz-kouy4-mpule-mqqq5-7grvy-gyikf-o6pvz-zqvgd-hqe to the backend admin list.

projectName: Add provided Principal ID to backend admin list
